# MPSSetHeapCacheDuration(_:_:)

**Function**

Sets the timeout after which unused cached Metal heaps are released.

## Declaration

```swift
func MPSSetHeapCacheDuration(_ cmdBuf: any MTLCommandBuffer, _ seconds: Double)
```
